title: Honor level 1 - checkpoint 1
body: I have rarely been getting punished - just wondering if my honor is getting locked or any of that? Could a riot employee look into my account?!  I'm trying my best to be a positive player!!

replies.body: its not just i got punished back in april. still honour 0 3/3 it takes forever.
you get it back fast if ur good and are honoured a lot, if ur bad try stay positive and make people laugh in chat or something and be supportive they might pity honour you

Like if you really want to be an honorable player  mix if up go different modes :

Bots , ARAM , Normals any tbh. Like be a respectable , fun person to play with. No salt no toxicity and your all set. Just got be patient to get past honor lvl 1 . I know its a grind cause of the checkpoints but if you wait the rewards will be eventful. I noticed that when I got mine to Honor LVL 5. Huge grind but it was worth
